There are few anime that force you to question and examine every scene you see. This is one of those. A question comes about, the moment you start this anime. How did it get to this? As some one who has no clue, I will enjoy figuring that out. Though, the sadness of such may be much to bear.
For anyone thinking "should I watch this?". ABSOLUTELY YES. I almost drop it after first ep cuz it's confusing but here I am, rewatching this masterpiece. Enjoy the ride!
